Infectum.text: kə-mqarəš b-kul mede ʻer mischt sich in alles einʼ; 165; qay kəmqaršat mini = qay koməǧġolat mini (Ilyas p.c. 17.01.2021) ‘Why do you meddle with me?’

Preterit.text: Noše ḥrene lo mqarašše Other people didn’t interfere (Ilyas p.c. 3/11/23)
Lu+talgo qrəšle i+arʕo = Lu+talgo mkasele i+arʕo (Ilyas p.c. 13/01/25)

Infectum-wa.text: W ánnaqqa u+qalәb̥ste g̊saymíwaynale, quršíwayna ... әmṭíwayna ánnaqqa qaṣmono dat+tanure:  qáṭmoyo, qaṣmono? (Ni ġala 57) And then (first) we made a pattern vessel, we used to put a layer…  we used to bring ashes of tannoor.
